import Alertstripe from 'nav-frontend-alertstriper';
import Example from './../../../../guideline-app/app/ui/components/example/Example';
import Ikonknapp, {
	Hamburgerknapp,
    Systemerknapp,
    Xknapp,
    Tilbakeknapp,
    Nesteknapp,
    Menyknapp,
    Søkeknapp
} from './..';

import { NAVLogoCircle } from './../../../../guideline-app/app/assets/images/svg';
import { Cog, User } from './icons.js';

## Normal

Normal Ikonknapp er en standard [knapp](/components/knapp) med ikonet på venstre side. Ikonet blir rendret 22x22 px stort.

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog}>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog}>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Typer

Ikonknapp støtter alle forskjellige typer knapper.

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog}>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp><br/><br/>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp><br/><br/>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp><br/><br/>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog}>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Ikon til høyre

Bruk `ikonHøyre`-propen for å sette ikonet på høyre side.

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} ikonHøyre>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} ikonHøyre>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Kompakt

Bruk `kompakt`-propen for å redusere venstre-/høyre-padding i knappen.

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} kompakt>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} kompakt>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Bare ikon

Bruk `bareIkon`-propen for å rendre knappen uten tekst.

<Alertstripe type="advarsel">
	Når du bruker <code className="inline">bareIkon</code> eller <code className="inline">rund</code> må du huske å likevel gi knappen tekstinnhold for å gjøre den forståelig for skjermleserbrukere.
</Alertstripe>

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} bareIkon type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Rund

Bruk `rund`-propen for å rendre knappen uten tekst og rund.

<Example>
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>&nbsp;
    <Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
const Cog = (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M23.5 10h-2.854c-.2-.79-.454-1.667-.778-2.332L21.9 5.636a.498.498 0 0 0 0-.708l-2.83-2.826a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0l-2.032 2.031c-.665-.324-1.542-.578-2.331-.777V.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v2.856c-.789.199-1.666.453-2.331.777L5.637 2.102a.499.499 0 0 0-.707 0L2.101 4.929a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .707l2.033 2.033c-.323.662-.578 1.54-.779 2.331H.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h2.855c.2.791.455 1.668.778 2.331L2.1 18.364a.5.5 0 0 0 0 .708L4.93 21.9c.188.188.52.188.707 0l2.032-2.032c.663.322 1.54.577 2.331.778V23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h3a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-2.854c.791-.201 1.668-.456 2.331-.778l2.034 2.032a.5.5 0 0 0 .707 0l2.827-2.828a.499.499 0 0 0 0-.707l-2.032-2.033c.323-.663.578-1.54.778-2.331H23.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-3a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.501zM12 16c-2.205 0-4-1.795-4-4s1.795-4 4-4c2.206 0 4 1.795 4 4s-1.794 4-4 4z"/></svg>);

<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund>Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="hoved">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="fare">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
<Ikonknapp ikon={Cog} rund type="flat">Ikonknapp</Ikonknapp>
```

## Ferdige konfigurasjoner

Denne pakken kommer også med flere ferdige ikonknapp-konfigurasjoner inkludert tilhørende ikon ut-av-boksen.

### Hamburgerknapp

<Example>
	<Hamburgerknapp />
</Example>

```jsx
import { Hamburgerknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Hamburgerknapp />
```

### Systemerknapp

<Example>
	<Systemerknapp />
</Example>

```jsx
import { Systemerknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Systemerknapp />
```

### Xknapp

<Example>
	<Xknapp />
</Example>

```jsx
import { Xknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Xknapp />
```

### Tilbake- og Nesteknapp

<Example>
	<Tilbakeknapp />&nbsp;
	<Nesteknapp />
</Example>

```jsx
import { Tilbakeknapp, Nesteknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Tilbakeknapp />
<Nesteknapp />
```

### Menyknapp

<Example>
	<Menyknapp />&nbsp;
	<Menyknapp>Annen tekst</Menyknapp>
</Example>

```jsx
import { Menyknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Menyknapp />
<Menyknapp>Annen tekst</Menyknapp>
```

### Søkeknapp

<Example>
	<Søkeknapp />
</Example>

```jsx
import { Søkeknapp } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapp';

<Søkeknapp />
```
